pkgmetadata.longdescription: Build Dirichlet Process Objects for Bayesian Modelling // Create Dirichlet process objects that can be used as infinite mixture models in a variety of ways. Some examples include; density estimation, Poisson process intensity inference, hierarchical modelling and clustering. See Teh, Y. W. (2011) https://www.stats.ox.ac.uk/~teh/research/npbayes/Teh2010a.pdf, among many other sources.
